% CONFIGURACIÓN DE ENTORNOS

% Theorems
\theoremstyle{plain}
\newtheorem{axiom}{Axioma}[chapter]
\theoremstyle{plain}
\newtheorem{theorem}[axiom]{Teorema}
\theoremstyle{plain}
\newtheorem{proposition}[axiom]{Proposición}
\theoremstyle{plain}
\newtheorem{corollary}[axiom]{Corolario}

\theoremstyle{remark}
\newtheorem*{remark}{Remark}
\newtheorem*{example}{Ejemplo}

% Marked theorem
\newcommand{\newmarkedtheorem}[1]{%
  \newenvironment{#1}
    {\pushQED{\qed}\csname inner@#1\endcsname}
    {\popQED\csname endinner@#1\endcsname}%
  \newtheorem{inner@#1}%
}

\theoremstyle{definition}
\newmarkedtheorem{definition}[axiom]{Definición}

% New proof environment
\expandafter\let\expandafter\oldproof\csname\string\proof\endcsname
\let\oldendproof\endproof
\renewenvironment{proof}[1][Demostración]{%
	\oldproof[\itshape#1]%
	}{\oldendproof}

% Tables configuration (tabular)
\newcolumntype{C}[1]{%
	>{\vbox to 3ex\bgroup\vfill\centering}%
	m{#1}%
	<{\egroup}} 
\newcolumntype{D}{ >{\centering\arraybackslash} m{30pt} }

% Equation environment
\setcounter{MaxMatrixCols}{20}
